item.title: My First Wi-Fi Pentest with Aircrack-ng (Beginner Tutorial)
item.description:
My First Wi-Fi Pentest with Aircrack-ng (Beginner Tutorial)

This was my very first attempt at Wi-Fi pentesting. It wasn’t smooth sailing – I made a bunch of rookie mistakes – but by the end, I managed to capture and crack my test Wi-Fi password. Here’s exactly what I did (and what I messed up).

⚠️ Disclaimer: Only perform these tests on your own network or a network you have explicit permission to test. Hacking into networks without permission is illegal.
